field.name: description
field.value:
Suggested by German Schauger in user group
# Derive the filename from session factory ID or alias when not explicitly specified. # Derive dependant files from the <assemblies></assemblies> node entries (common usage) when not explicitly specified.

comment.author: tehlike
comment.text: Fixed in rev 5601 by the patch of German Schauger

comment.author: tehlike
comment.text: * '''Type''' changed from ''Bug'' to ''Improvement''. * '''Importance''' changed from ''High'' to ''Medium''.

comment.author: tehlike
comment.text: * '''Resolution''' set to ''Fixed''. * '''Version Fixed''' set to ''Future''. * '''Status''' changed from ''Open'' to ''Resolved''.
